Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; de; rv:1.9.2.17) Gecko/20110414 Lightning/1.0b2 Thunderbird/3.1.10

The recipients 

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. open the compose window
2. add at least 5 recipients, so that the vertical scrollbar is visible
3. scroll either to the top or the bottom
4. start selecting the contents of a recipient textbox
5. instead of selecting only the contents, drag the mouse pointer op or down outside the addressingwidget

Actual Results:  
the widget scolls up or down, but the contents that should be revealed are not visible, a blank area is shown instead.
the recipients are shown if the blank area is clicked, if the scrollbar is used, or if the mousewheel is used inside the addressingwidget

Expected Results:  
the recipients should be visible as expected
